resources.string: Scribe is a social link aggregation and discussion platform, powered by Lemmy. Content is organized into communities, so it is easy to subscribe to topics that you are interested in, and ignore others.
To continue you need to install Voyager first.\\nPlease select install to continue with the installation on F-Droid.

Disroot\'s Audio is powered by Mumble. Mumble is a free, open source, low latency, high quality voice chat application. It was originally intended for gamers, but it can be use to organize audio meeting, conference, etc.
To continue you need to install Mumla first.\\nPlease select install to continue with the installation on F-Droid

Akkoma is a microblogging server software that can federate (= exchange messages with) other servers that support ActivityPub, like Friendica, GNU Social, Hubzilla, Mastodon, Misskey, Peertube, and Pixelfed.
To continue you need to install Fedilab first.\\nPlease select install to continue with the installation on F-Droid

Disroot\'s Translate is a machine translation service, powered by LibreTranslate. LibreTranslate supports a lot of languages. It is an useful tool for those wishing to translate text between different languages. It is also a valuable tool for developers wishing to create translation applications.
